alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 07 at 6:33PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Umatilla County through 700 PM PDT... At 632 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over northwestern Umatilla Reservation, or 7 miles east of Pendleton, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Landspout possible, winds in excess of 30 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pendleton, Adams, Thorn Hollow, Cayuse, Mission and northern Umatilla Reservation. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
